Class UserTest

java.lang.Object
  UserTest

public class UserTest
extends Object

One method class that runs in the beginning of the game and whenever the user wins a card from the opponent. Checks wether the game is already over by checking the sizes of each players hand. Uses a scanner to take the user input on what to compare. Compares the attribute with the computer and runs the according method.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Antonios Skandalis, Nuria Cano Girones

Method for the automation of the user player.

Parameters:
userCards - The ArrayList storing the cards of the user player.
pcCards - The ArrayList storing the cards of the computer player.
cards - The ArrayList storing all the cards.
avMagic - Int variable for average magic attribute.
avSpeed - Int variable for average speed attribute.
avLethality - Int variable for average lethality attribute.
avStrength - Int variable for average strength attribute.
avMorality - Int variable for average morality attribute.
